summary: Brie’s haircut would be considered a bob or maybe even a pixie. To be specific with a hairstylist you’d be better off just using...
question: Brie’s haircut would be considered a bob or maybe even a pixie. To be specific with a hairstylist you’d be better off just using pictures for reference
answer:
Yes! You’re right. Her styled hair is a bob.

So I showed my stylist this video

But he ended up cutting it a bit shorter and I ended up loving it.

😌✊🏾

summary: Do the people who say that Tony Stark is nothing without his suit know who invented the suit? Who built it? Who keeps upgrading...
body:
Do the people who say that Tony Stark is nothing without his suit know who invented the suit? Who built it? Who keeps upgrading it?

You’re confusing him with batman, this guy builds his own shit.

blog.name: tristanjmiller
blog.title: Actor, Writer, Comedian, Podcaster!
blog.description: Tristan Miller is an actor, writer, podcaster, stand-up comedian, and mental health activist. He has been featured on The Good Men project, Stigma Fighters, The Psych Show, and has begun work on a one-man show called, Manic Impressive. Tristan hosts, edits, and produces three podcasts: Positive and Negative, TheAmateur Detective Club, and Anime-Zing Podcast.

summary: Lmao. I love how the men on the internet have decided to pick another random women to hurdle all their pent up misogyny towards....
body: Lmao. I love how the men on the internet have decided to pick another random women to hurdle all their pent up misogyny towards. Like all of a sudden I’m seeing hordes of videos with millions of views over the past few days about “Why everyone hates Brie Larson” and I was so confused at first bc I thought she actually did something wrong, but nope men are just wild lmao.

question: hope van dyne
answer:
What are your expectations for Captain Marvel?

I am so excited about her and her role in the next marvel phase. I expect great things and honestly anything she does is incredible so I will not be disappointed. I just want to see her fighting and winning and sassing and possible Carol/Rhodey like in the comics?? (Would love Carol/Maria but we all know how Marvel feels about THAT)

summary: I am a male marvel fan and my favourite Marvel character is Carol Danvers / Captain Marvel. Maybe you shouldnt hate all men just...
question: I am a male marvel fan and my favourite Marvel character is Carol Danvers / Captain Marvel. Maybe you shouldnt hate all men just because they are men.
answer:
First of all, I don’t hate men, I quite enjoy men.

Second of all, bro, we all get that it’s “not all men” it’s statistically impossible that there will be zero male Marvel fans who love Carol.

Part of having male privilege, is realizing when other men are doing sexist / toxic things, and using your own privilege to speak up and bring attention to problems.

And guess what! Right now, a problem is that your fav is being hated on for being “OP” like hulk or thor, cocky like Tony, and having no ass. Obviously this would not be a problem if she was a guy, like straight up we have characters exactly like her and all that’s different is that they’re male, and people think it’s fantastic.

I’m not saying, yo, men suck because of this, I’m saying that a fair amount of men, and guess what! Women too! Are pushing the stereotype that women need to be a certain way. And frankly, thats bullshit.

Also, can’t believe I just put all that effort into an ask, only to check your blog to find you’re a porn blog. This is my life yo.
